At the end of each of its turns, the target can attempt a Constitution saving throw to end the spell. Dealing at least 15 Slashing damage to the target opens an airway allowing it to breathe, but  the curse seals the opening at the start of your next turn.

spell.name: Wrack
entries: Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be afflicted with excruciating muscle spasms for the duration. On a failed save, the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is halved and it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on a success.

spell.name: Curse of Conceited Obsession

m.text: a thread from the bed or clothes of your target, a handful of teeth, and a gilded mirror worth 1,000+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with an obsessive self-infatuation. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. Successful {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}. On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 4d6} Psychic damage and is aware it was targeted by a curse. Additionally, for 1 minute, the target takes {@damage 1d6} Psychic damage at the start of each of its turns.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 8d10} Psychic damage and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the cursed creature looks into a mirror or reflective surface, the surface cracks or become distorted in some way, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature is compelled to stop and admire itself whenever it sees its reflection. It constantly fusses over its appearance.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature becomes obsessed with looking for its reflection wherever it goes, including in the eyes of its foes. Attacks against the cursed creature have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature is driven to find or build a location where it can see its own reflection from many angles. The cursed creature is compelled to remain in this location and admire itself. Additionally, the cursed creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls from its obsession with its own appearance.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Weeping Willow.

spell.name: Curse of Crushing Sensation

m.text: a drop of the target's blood, a shred of silk material, and a horn worth 1,000+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with painful hypersensitivity to physical sensations. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

entries.name: Successful Saving Throw
entries: On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 4d6} Thunder damage and is aware it was targeted by a curse. For 1 minute, the target takes {@damage 1d6} Thunder damage at the start of each of its turns.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 8d10} Thunder damage and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the target hears a loud noise, it gets a crippling headache, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature avoids {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB}, loud noises, extreme temperatures, and doesn't like to be touched.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature can't stand the feeling of rough or heavy clothing against its skin. It can't wear armor. It has {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to Thunder damage from its hypersensitivity. Additionally, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls if it or its target is in an area of {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB}.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: Even mild sensory input becomes intolerable to the cursed creature. It is driven to find a dark and quiet lair, such as a deep cave or dungeon. The cursed creature can't willingly leave this lair and has {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to all damage except for Psychic damage while outside its lair.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Sightless Agony.

spell.name: Curse of Damned Aging

m.text: a childhood possession of the target, a pint of blood, and a watch worth 600+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with horrific aging. The target must make a Strength saving throw.

entries.name: Successful Saving Throw
entries: On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 2d10} Necrotic damage and is aware it was targeted by a curse. For 1 minute, the target has {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage (you choose when you cast the spell).

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d10} Necrotic damage and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the target finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, it finds multiple wrinkles, grey hairs, or spots it didn't previously have, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature is compelled to rest when the occasion permits it, becoming lethargic and lazy.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature becomes feeble. After finishing a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB}, the creature can only use 25 percent of its {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB}, rounded up, to regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature starts to age rapidly, becoming decrepit. The cursed creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Body Snatcher.

spell.name: Curse of Fastidious Pride

m.text: a shred of the target's clothing, an uncrushed dead spider, and a sewing needle worth 600+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with narcissistic hubris.

The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. Successful {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}. On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 2d10} Psychic damage and is aware it was targeted by a curse.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d10} Psychic damage, has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition for 1 minute, and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the target hears its name spoken, the speaker sounds derisive regardless of its actual tone, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature hears veiled insults everywhere, believing everyone is jealous of its brilliance and talent.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature feels restless unless it is actively working to accomplish a goal. The cursed creature gains no benefit from its {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short Rests}.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature believes everyone is involved in a conspiracy to bring about its downfall. Whenever it fails a {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB}, it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the next {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} it makes.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Mind Siphon.

spell.name: Curse of Foul Blight

m.text: a shred of the target's hair or flesh, a chunk of rotten meat, and a jewelry box worth 600+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with a putrefying and stinking pox. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. Successful {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}. On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 3d10} Necrotic damage and is aware it was targeted by a curse. Additionally, it can't gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} or regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} for 1 minute.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d10} Necrotic damage and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the target searches for its garments or equipment, it finds an infestation of insects, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature is afflicted with a minor cough. Whenever it speaks more than a few words at a time, it breaks into a fit of coughing. This does not affect spellcasting.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The smell of putrescence lingers in the air around the cursed creature. Food and drink quickly spoil, jewelry tarnishes, and wood rots within 10 feet of the cursed creature. Additionally, the cursed creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Charisma ability checks and saving throws, and it can't maintain {@status Concentration|XPHB}.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature's skin becomes riddled with pockmarks, pustules, and lesions. Insects flock to the cursed creature, infesting its clothes. The cursed creature can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} except by spending {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB} after finishing a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Plague Carrion.

spell.name: Curse of Ill-Fated Fortune

m.text: a discarded piece of the target's equipment, a splinter of bone, and a collection of dice worth 800+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with lethal bad luck. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw.

entries.name: Successful Saving Throw
entries: On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 3d10} Thunder damage and is aware it was targeted by a curse. Additionally,  the creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the first {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} it makes in the next 1 minute.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 7d10} Thunder damage and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the target walks through a doorway, the target stubs its toe or bashes its head, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature falls victim to minor inconveniences and bad luck. Shops it wishes to visit close just as it arrives, and its equipment breaks at inconvenient moments.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature becomes a beacon of bad luck as otherwise harmless setbacks become increasingly dangerous. Objects constantly seem to be placed in the creature's way. Additionally, the cursed creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ability checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature becomes dangerously prone to accidents, as even the simplest tasks have unforeseen life-threatening consequences. The cursed creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} checks, its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is reduced to 10 feet, and it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition if it misses an attack roll.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Herald of Calamity.

spell.name: Curse of Insatiable Greed

m.text: a coin that the target has previously possessed, the tail of a rat, and a golden crown of thorns worth 800+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with a bitter and self-destructive greed. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. Successful {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}. On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 4d10} Cold damage and is aware it was targeted by a curse.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d10} Cold damage, and its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is reduced to 0 for 1 minute. At the end of each turns, the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} increases by 5 feet, until it reaches its maximum {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the target finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, it notices it has lost a valued item, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature becomes compelled to steal trinkets.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature finds a secret place to start stashing its stolen trinkets, and it becomes anxious about leaving the location for extended periods of time. The creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ability checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature is driven to transform its hoard of trinkets into a labyrinth of possessions and treasure. The cursed creature desires to remain in this lair. The creature can't take {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB|Reactions}.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Verminous Abomination.

spell.name: Curse of Lost Sentiment

m.text: a lock of hair from someone the target loves, an animal's heart, and an idol worth 600+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with the loss of memories and horrific madness. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw.

entries.name: Successful Saving Throw
entries: On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 3d10} Force damage, has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn, and is unaware it was targeted by a curse.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d10} Force damage, has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn, and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the target finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, it suffers nightmarish visions of being abandoned or left alone, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature begins forgetting events that have occurred within the past few days and the names of acquaintances.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature forgets all but its closest companions, and it has delusions of hidden threats and scheming rivals. Additionally, the cursed creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Intelligence ability checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature forgets its closest companions, its own identity, and its goals. The curse fabricates delusions of a great conspiracy that only the cursed creature can prevent. The cursed creature is compelled to take any action it believes necessary to uncover this conspiracy. The creature can't take {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB|Bonus Actions}.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Dream Whisperer.

spell.name: Curse of Ravenous Hunger

m.text: a morsel of food that belonged to the target, a sun-dried slug, and a dining plate worth 400+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with painful and unending starvation. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

entries.name: Successful Saving Throw
entries: On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 2d10} Poison damage, has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn, and is aware it was targeted by a curse.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d10} Poison damage, has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 1 minute, and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time it eats a meal, the cursed creature bites its tongue and its mouth fills with blood, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature is gripped with an insatiable appetite.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature becomes compelled to eat inappropriate items such as coins, flowers, glass, and dirt. Additionally, the cursed creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Constitution saving throws, and its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} maximum decreases by an amount equal to its character level (or {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB|Hit Dice} if it has no character level).

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature becomes ravenous and is compelled to consume the flesh of Humanoids. No other food satiates it. The creature can't have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests}.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes a Bloated Gastromorph.

spell.name: Curse of Uncontrollable Wrath

m.text: blood or other fluid of the target, a severed hand, and a serrated knife worth 1,000+ GP, all of which the spell consumes

entries: This spell curses a creature with an uncontrollable temper and a lust for violence. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw.

entries.name: Successful Saving Throw
entries: On a successful save, the target takes {@damage 4d10} Psychic damage and is aware it was targeted by a curse. Additionally, for 1 minute, the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attacks made using {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB|Reactions}.

entries.name: Initial Effect
entries: On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 8d10} Psychic damage and is cursed.

entries.name: Triggering Event
entries: The next time the cursed creature attacks with a weapon or casts a spell using a {@variantrule Spellcasting Focus|XPHB}, an old wound reopens, and the curse advances to Stage 1.

entries.name: Stage 1
entries: The cursed creature becomes easily agitated and aggressive.

entries.name: Stage 2
entries: The cursed creature becomes obsessed with violence. The thrill of solo battle intoxicates it, and its demeanor toward its allies sours as the curse grows. The cursed creature gains no benefit from its {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short Rests}.

entries.name: Stage 3
entries: The cursed creature is driven to insatiable bloodlust, unable to rest while there are enemies to slaughter. The cursed creature gains no benefit from its {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB|Long Rests}.

entries.name: Culmination
entries: The cursed creature twists into a deformed figure and becomes an Avatar of Slaughter.
